My indecision is mainly coming down to HP, is 468 too low ?

When comparing the 2 builds I am essentially giving up 1 Melee AB, 1 Dev Crit DC for 40 HP and 1 Ranged AB (which is pretty much inconsequential)

This still leaves him with a AB of 50 and a Dev Crit DC of 41 which is quite respectable.  

I realise that this can become 51 and 42 if I push that rogue level back to Epic but for playability I think the early UMD is quite nice. (If things are going well I can always delay it anyway)

Generally speaking what sort of HP should I be aiming for in a Melee toon ?


Thanks again for you advice.

posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content:
I like the second one better. You didn't mention that it also gets one higher Reflex and Fortitude saves. I would shuffle around the pre-epic feats, swapping Cleave and Expertise because that extra attack is a big deal when you only have one attack per round. I'd move Blind Fight to level 6, bumping the other feats a little bit later as needed.
This all depends on where you are playing. If you are playing in an environment where leveling is a preliminary and the real game begins when you reach level 40, then don't bother shuffling the feats, and move Rogue 1 into epic levels to get that additional AB. If the game is almost over when you reach 40, or you might not reach level 40 at all, then shuffle the feats as mentioned earlier, and leave Rogue 1 where it is now.
